00012 UISearchWidget::UISearchWidget(boost::shared_ptr<const TranslationManager> translation_manager, QWidget* parent) : 
00013     QWidget(parent),
00014     m_translation_manager(translation_manager),
00015     m_search_button(new QPushButton(tr("Search"))),
00016     m_search_input_field(new QLineEdit(tr("Search Text")))
00017 {

00019     QObject::connect(m_search_input_field, SIGNAL(returnPressed()), this, SLOT(perform_search()));

00044 void UISearchWidget::perform_search()
00045 {
00046     CommandPerformSearch search_command(m_translation_manager, m_search_input_field->text().toStdString());
00047     search_command.Execute();
00048     emit search_complete(search_command.get_results());
00049 }
